channel.title: Robot Underpants (Audio)
channel.description: A weekly selection of entertainment, news and geekery from around the world.
channel.itunes:summary: Internet's Langley brings you all the news that's fit to be squeezed into a video frame, in under 30 minutes. Tune in to hear commentary, entertainment news, and generally absurd nonsense each week on Robot Underpants.
channel.itunes:author: Matt Luschek
channel.itunes:subtitle: A weekly selection of entertainment, news and geekery from around the world.

item.title: Robot Underpants: #52 05.30.12
item.dc:creator: Langley
item.description: Langley, Spin, Starman, and Annika Skywalker discuss copyright overkill, zombie apocalypse, “Amercia” Star Trek and more! * Beware your wedding music on Youtube * Zombie Apocalypse Begins * Politwoops * Hateful Church Kid * Star Trek 2 Has No Kahn * Amercia   End Track: Jedi Five “Yeah I’m Goin I’m Goin Like A Muthafucka” [...]
item.content:encoded:
Langley, Spin, Starman, and Annika Skywalker discuss copyright overkill, zombie apocalypse, “Amercia” Star Trek and more!

* Beware your wedding music on Youtube

* Zombie Apocalypse Begins

* Politwoops

* Hateful Church Kid 

* Star Trek 2 Has No Kahn

* Amercia
 
End Track:
Jedi Five
“Yeah I’m Goin I’m Goin Like A Muthafucka” (mp3)
from “Relentless”
(Hellbent Records)

item.title: Robot Underpants #40 03.07.12
item.dc:creator: Langley
item.description: Langley, Spin and Starman test drive Google+ Hangouts with On Air and discuss the New iPad, Titanic, overpriced movie snacks, John Carter and more. * Avengers Memorabilia Auction * Moon contributed to Titanic wreck * Man sues AMC theaters * Lotto winner still on food stamps * Lego Space Shuttle in Space * John Carter [...]
item.content:encoded:
Langley, Spin and Starman test drive Google+ Hangouts with On Air and discuss the New iPad, Titanic, overpriced movie snacks, John Carter and more.

* Avengers Memorabilia Auction

* Moon contributed to Titanic wreck

* Man sues AMC theaters

* Lotto winner still on food stamps

* Lego Space Shuttle in Space

* John Carter

 

This week’s end track:

Super Deejay Bobzilla
“Ah Shit!” (mp3)
from “Ah Shit!”
(Mutate Records)

item.title: Robot Underpants #33 01.18.12
item.dc:creator: Langley
item.description: Langley, Spin and Starman discuss SOPA, Star Wars in 3D, and Snow. * Lucas Resigns * FDR American Badass * The Barkside
item.content:encoded:
